title: Matina Horner: portrait of a person
brief_description: Matina Horner is the sixth president of Radliffe College, Massachusetts, whose main concern is with the future of women in the university. Mrs. Horner comments on the administration of institutions such as Radcliffe and Harvard, about young women and young people in general, and the role of educational institutions. Focusing on her Greek heritage shows her early years through photographs and home movies. Includes some animation.
